name: Abhay Bhansali
my_business: We are Resellers of Test & Measuring Instruments, These Instruments are used in Maintenance side of Industry, May it be Hotel Industry or Hospital or any Manufacturing Industry or Assembly line.  Instrument like Ampere measuring, Volts Measuring, Temperature Measuring, Insulation Tester, Vernier Calipers, ph Meters, Light Meters, Sound Meters and many more.  We have a collective experience of 40 years in this field.
top_product: Clamp Meters, Multimeters, Thermometers, Insulation Testers, Earth Testers,
ideal_referral: Manufacturing Industries, Hospitality Industries.
top_problem_solved: Leather Industry had a issue measuring temperature on their steel plate with non contact measurement, when they will have infra-red measurement the measurement will not come correct, they were not able to solve it, when we visited the site, we by our experience, knew that this will not measure right since it was a shiny plate. Hence we put a patch of black tape and took measurement on that, The temperature measurements were right
